destinations.name: Paris
destinations.description: The city of lights, known for its rich history, culture, and architecture. Must-see attractions include the Eiffel Tower, Louvre Museum, and Notre-Dame Cathedral.

destinations.name: New York City
destinations.description: The city that never sleeps offers iconic landmarks such as the Statue of Liberty, Central Park, Times Square, and a thriving arts scene.
destinations.peak_season: April to June, September to November

destinations.name: Tokyo
destinations.description: A fascinating mix of modern skyscrapers and traditional temples. Visit the Tokyo Tower, Senso-ji Temple, and experience the famous Shibuya Crossing.
destinations.peak_season: March to May, September to November

destinations.name: Sydney
destinations.description: Known for its Sydney Opera House, Harbour Bridge, and beautiful beaches like Bondi and Manly. Explore the vibrant arts scene and laid-back lifestyle.
destinations.peak_season: September to November, March to May

destinations.name: Cape Town
destinations.description: Nestled between mountains and the ocean, Cape Town is famous for its Table Mountain, Robben Island, and beautiful beaches. A must-visit for nature lovers.
